product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Hot Apple Cobbler - 2 Servings
long_description: Enjoy the Backpacker's Pantry hot apple cobbler on your next overnight adventure. Requires cooking; add apples and sauce to 1 cup of water, stir, then bring to a boil; reduce heat and cook for 5 min., stirring occasionally. Add 3 tablespoons of water to cobbler mix and stir until smooth; spread cobbler mix over apples then cover and cook over low heat for 10 min. in a nonstick pan. Backpacker's Pantry Hot apple cobbler serves 2. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy the Backpacker's Pantry hot apple cobbler on your next overnight adventure.
